title: Papyrus Inscribed in Hieratic
description:
A hieratic letter in black ink. Recto has 9 lines of text that form the beginning of a letter as the formulae clearly attest. The verso with 4 lines of text has the date “2nd month of Axt day 24” and later mentions “one pair of sandals.” Joins with 37.1804E.
Condition: Incomplete.
dimensions:
Glass: 7 5/8 x 9 9/16 in. (19.3 x 24.3 cm)
Largest Fragment: 7/8 x 4 1/4 in. (2.2 x 10.8 cm)

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
